tal:block.h1: Creative Commons Magnatune Lisa DeBenedictis Remix Contest Winners
tal:block.p: Thirteen people who uploaded 15 tracks won the Magnatune Lisa DeBenedictis Remix Contest. Due to the high-quality remixes received, Magnatune increased the winning entries from 10 to 15.

Winners are signed to a Magnatune standard "non-evil" recording contract. Also, the winning entries are included on a forthcoming Lisa DeBenedictis remix album to be sold commercially where the artists' share (50% from the first sale) will be split between the winners and (of course) the artists they sample.

p.i: Again, because of the high quality of submissions, Magnatune will be signing 15 more songs for another Magnatune-released CD in the future, independent of this contest.

div.h2: The Magnatune Lisa DeBenedictis Remix Contest Winners

div.p: "Musicians need to be in control and enjoy the process of having their music released. The systematic destruction of musician's lives is unacceptable: musicians are very close to staging a revolution (and some already have)."

p.a: Read more about this innovative music label.
